name: ethereum-testnet-examples
description: Examples for interacting with local Ethereum testnet

scripts.check-balance: node -e "const {ethers} = require('ethers'); const provider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider('http://localhost:8545'); provider.getBalance('0x7E5F4552091A69125d5DfCb7b8C2659029395Bdf').then(b => console.log('Balance:', ethers.formatEther(b), 'ETH'));"

author: Your Name
